thread.title: Watch: Akdong Musician's Lee Soo Hyun Reveals Her Plans For When She Turns 20 | Soompi
thread.title_full: Watch: Akdong Musician's Lee Soo Hyun Reveals Her Plans For When She Turns 20 | Soompi

author: U. Kim
title: Watch: Akdong Musician's Lee Soo Hyun Reveals Her Plans For When She Turns 20 | Soompi
text:
Shares 2K Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
Akdong Musician guested on the February 25 episode of “Yoo Hee Yeol’s Sketchbook,” and Lee Soo Hyun talked about the things she wants to do when she turns 20 (in Korean age). 
Lee Soo Hyun expressed, “I’m into games, but minors can’t enter gaming rooms after 10 o’clock. But next year, I’ll be allowed to do so.” At that, Yoo Hee Yeol asked in disbelief, “Your dream is to go to a gaming room when you turn 20?” and laughed. 
Meanwhile, on the same episode, Lee Chan Hyuk revealed why their song “Last Goodbye” is special to him . 
Take a look at their cover of Shin Hae Chul’s “To You” (direct translation) and a performance of their own “Play Ugly”!
